data.eml:eml: Freshwater decapods of Puerto Rico: a checklist and reports of new localities

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pérez-Reyes, Omar, Crowl, Todd A., Hernández-García, Pablo J., Ledesma-Fusté, Ricardo, Villar-Fornes, Fernando A., Covich, Alan P. (2013): Freshwater decapods of Puerto Rico: a checklist and reports of new localities. Zootaxa 3717 (3): 329-344, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3717.3.3
